name: HSP_QI_PATIENT_SAFETY
description: Patient safety indicators for the hospital account. This table is related to ZC_QI_PATIENT_SAFETY.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: QI_PATIENT_SAFETY_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient safety indicator category ID for the hospital account.
